children: You can contribute by opening GithHub issues and proposing PR for the project. Alternatively you can get in touch with the developers, but this tend to cost more time.

content.name: p
children: This is an open source project. You can have it for free, you can contribute improvements, and you can try to request infromation to the developers. Keep in mind it's not guaranteed you'll get quick feedback, as OpenSource developers tendo to be very busy trying to make a living by means of working on free software projects.
